channel.description: Recent content on lubieniebieski by adam nowak

item.title: Playing with Webmentions
item.description: With so many site visitors and reactions on Mastodon (LOL), I decided to try out webmentions.

item.title: January was NICE
item.description: Here are some of things that were with me in January. A few tools and a few observations I have made recently. I'm writing about Arc browser, Mastodon and social.lol.

item.title: 100 Rings Closed
item.description: I've just closed the activity rings for 100th consecutive day!

item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description: So... Last night I had this idea of changing one more thing in my setup and that was to move my site from Wordpress to Hugo.

item.title: Where am I 2023?
item.description: After the events in Twitter back in 2022, I decided to rethink a bit my visibility there and other social media. Somehow, I ended up with a pretty old-school conclusion.

item.title: My workspace 2021
item.description: Another year, another post about the place where I spend the most of time! A few different shots, new items, including the standing option and new audio.

item.title: Cyk006: New Wallpaper (992 911 GT3 premiere), Turew, 2021
item.description: This week, the new Porsche GT3 has itâ€™s premiere. The flagship model is painted in a beautiful Shark Blue colour and I couldn’t resist to create my own specification (just in case I have 1M PLN to spare ğŸ™ˆ). Renders from the configurator went directly to my desktops and they are replacing the previous gen Porsche! I really like this one, especially all the blue accents (Shark Blue seatbelts, blue rim and lights decors).

item.title: My workspace 2020
item.description: Since I moved to my new office space some time ago, I wanted to build a workspace worth sharing. It’s very basic, works well for my needs and helps to get work done when I work at home! Core setup Laptop I like the blue color and I like Porsches as well. Couldn't resist having this beautiful 991.2 911 GT3 in Sapphire Blue. One day... I use a 2016 MacBook Pro 13â€³ in Space Gray.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Adam, nice to meet you! All I want to do on this page is to share my thoughts with the world and help others understand things which I struggle(d) with, so they donâ€™t have to come through the pain by themselves! I enjoy helping people. ğŸ™Œ Want to know even more about me? item.title: Hello world! (WordPress this time!)
item.description: Hello ğŸ‘‹! I’m experimenting with my site right now, stay tuned for the updates!

item.title: Improving daily work
item.description: Improving daily work is more important than daily work

item.title: DevOps != servers
item.description: I've always assumed that DevOps are the people who work between servers and developers. Well... that's not true!

item.title: Assume positive intent
item.description: Believe it or not, but most of the people don't want to make other people's lives worse and they don't plan to ruin your day! At least, I think so:)

item.title: Skip the "grumpy" part.
item.description: We all like to complain from time to time, that's in our nature, especially in my Polish nation. This post is not about judging who we are, but it's about the way we should reduce this step from our conversation with others.

item.title: Treat people the way you want to be treated. Actually, treat them better.
item.description: If I don't know how should I react in a given situation - I usually use this simple rule: Treat people the way you want to be treated. It works!

item.title: My principles for 2018: Slow down. Enjoy, don't rush.
item.description: I’ve started 2018 by finishing a book “Principles” by Ray Dalio. I’m impressed about how you can use rules to create your own way of living. I’ve decided that this year I’m going to implement MY principles and stick to them. I would also like to share them with other people so they can see them and know what they can expect from me. Sharing, as a bonus, comes with an external motivation ğŸ™‚
